## CharityORG.ascendVolunteer() method

Ascend a charity volunteer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
ascendVolunteer(memberName: string): CharityVolunteerAscension | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  memberName | string | Name of charity volunteer to ascend. |

**Returns:**

[CharityVolunteerAscension](./bitburner.charityvolunteerascension.md) \| undefined

Object with info about the ascension results, or undefined if ascension did not occur.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 4 GB

Ascend the specified charity volunteer.
